column1: Energy and Sustainability (Energy, Environment and Buildings) MSc
column3: Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences
column5: Learn about the relationship between energy and the environment on our energy and sustainability course. MSc sustainable energy gives you a chance to explore the current and projected impacts of climate change, and what this means for the energy industry. We've developed this master’s in renewable energy with specialists to make sure you develop the skills to assess the energy performance and climatic design of buildings and urban forms.  At the University of Southampton we’ll teach you vital skills for the energy and sustainability industry. You’ll learn how to:
